question: The 29th Regional Contact Points meeting of the Asia Pacific region of the World Customs Organization is being held at which city?
explanation:
The 29th Regional Contact Points (RCP) meeting of the Asia Pacific (A/P) region of the World Customs Organization (WCO) is being held at Puducherry from 18-20 November 2019. The meeting was organized by the Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC).
This annual meeting is designed to address regional development in a number of areas. It also discusses various issues linked to cross border trade procedures and to enhance communication and experience sharing between the member countries. The meeting highlighted the cultural importance of Puducherry. The meeting discussed issues of importance for the region and the ideas put forth by the member countries.
